trans-unit.source: Represents a set of data commands and a connection to a database that are used to fill the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> and update the database.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et sett med datakommandoer og en tilkobling til en database som brukes til å fylle den <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> og oppdatere databasen.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: This type is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Denne typen er avskrevet og vil bli fjernet i en fremtidig versjon av .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Oracle and ADO.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Oracle og ADO.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OracleDataAdapter serves as a bridge between a **DataSet** and database for retrieving and saving data.
trans-unit.target: OracleDataAdapter fungerer som en bro mellom en **datasettet** og -databasenavn for å hente og lagring av data.

trans-unit.source: The OracleDataAdapter provides this bridge by using <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> to load data from the database into the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, and using <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> to send changes made in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> back to the data source.
trans-unit.target: OracleDataAdapter gir denne broen ved å bruke <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>å laste inn data fra databasen til den <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, og bruker <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>til å sende endringene i den <xref:System.Data.DataSet>tilbake til datakilden.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the OracleDataAdapter fills a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, it creates the necessary tables and columns for the returned data if they do not already exist.
trans-unit.target: Når OracleDataAdapter fyller en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, opprettes det nødvendige tabellene og kolonnene for de returnerte dataene hvis de ikke allerede finnes.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: However, primary key information is not included in the implicitly created schema unless the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction>.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid primære nøkkelinformasjon er ikke inkludert i implisitt opprettet skjemaet med mindre <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>egenskapen er satt til <xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction>.</xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: You may also have the OracleDataAdapter create the schema of the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, including primary key information, before filling it with data using <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også ha OracleDataAdapter opprette skjemaet <xref:System.Data.DataSet>inkludert primære nøkkelinformasjon, før du fyller den med dataene ved hjelp av <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Adding Existing Constraints to a DataSet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [eksisterende begrensninger for å legge til et datasett](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > By default, numeric fields imported to a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> are mapped to <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber> objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Som standard numeriske felt som er importert til en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>med <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>er tilordnet til <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>objekter.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: It is possible to overflow the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>, and throw an Oracle exception, by importing a non-integral numeric value that is either too large or too high precision for the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>'s precision limitations.
trans-unit.target: Det er mulig å overflyt i <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>, og Iverksett et Oracle-unntak ved å importere en ikke-integral numerisk verdi som er for stort eller for høy presisjonen for den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>'s precision begrensningene.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>

trans-unit.source: Refer to the description of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber> for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se beskrivelsen av <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>for mer informasjon.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber>

trans-unit.source: The OracleDataAdapter also includes the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, and `TableMappings` properties to facilitate loading and updating of data.
trans-unit.target: OracleDataAdapter også den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, og `TableMappings` egenskaper for å forenkle lasting og oppdatering av data.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle does not support batched SQL statements.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework-dataleverandør for Oracle støtter ikke satsvise SQL-setninger.

trans-unit.source: However, it does allow you to use multiple `REF CURSOR` output parameters to fill a **DataSet**, each in its own <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Kan du bruke flere `REF CURSOR` sender parameterne til å fylle en **datasettet**hver i sin eier <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: You must define the parameters, mark them as output parameters, and indicate that they are `REF CURSOR` data types.
trans-unit.target: Du må definere parameterne, merke dem som utdataparametere og angi at de `REF CURSOR` datatyper.

trans-unit.source: Note that you cannot use the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> method when the OracleDataAdapter is filled using `REF CURSOR` parameters returned by a stored procedure, because Oracle does not provide the information necessary to determine what the table name and column names are when the SQL statement is executed.
trans-unit.target: Vær oppmerksom på at du ikke kan bruke den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>metoden når OracleDataAdapter er fylt med `REF CURSOR` parametere som ble returnert av en lagret prosedyre, fordi Oracle ikke leverer informasjonen som kreves for å finne ut hva tabellnavn og kolonnenavn er når SQL-setningen utføres.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following C# example assumes that you have created this stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: C# eksemplet antar at du har opprettet denne lagrede prosedyren.

trans-unit.source: Create the following Oracle package on the Oracle server.
trans-unit.target: Opprett følgende Oracle-pakke for Oracle-serveren.

trans-unit.source: ``` CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CURSPKG AS TYPE T_CURSOR IS REF CURSOR; PROCEDURE OPEN_ONE_CURSOR (N_EMPNO IN NUMBER, IO_CURSOR OUT T_CURSOR); PROCEDURE OPEN_TWO_CURSORS (EMPCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR, DEPTCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR); END CURSPKG; / ``` Create the following Oracle package body on the Oracle server.
trans-unit.target: ``` CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CURSPKG AS TYPE T_CURSOR IS REF CURSOR; PROCEDURE OPEN_ONE_CURSOR (N_EMPNO IN NUMBER, IO_CURSOR OUT T_CURSOR); PROCEDURE OPEN_TWO_CURSORS (EMPCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR, DEPTCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR); END CURSPKG; / ```Opprette følgende Oracle pakken meldingsteksten i Oracle-serveren.

trans-unit.source: ``` CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CURSPKG AS PROCEDURE OPEN_ONE_CURSOR (N_EMPNO IN NUMBER, IO_CURSOR OUT T_CURSOR) IS V_CURSOR T_CURSOR; BEGIN IF N_EMPNO <> 0 THEN OPEN V_CURSOR FOR SELECT EMP.EMPNO, EMP.ENAME, DEPT.DEPTNO, DEPT.DNAME FROM EMP, DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO AND EMP.EMPNO = N_EMPNO; ELSE OPEN V_CURSOR FOR SELECT EMP.EMPNO, EMP.ENAME, DEPT.DEPTNO, DEPT.DNAME FROM EMP, DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO; END IF; IO_CURSOR := V_CURSOR; END OPEN_ONE_CURSOR; PROCEDURE OPEN_TWO_CURSORS (EMPCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR, DEPTCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR) IS V_CURSOR1 T_CURSOR; V_CURSOR2 T_CURSOR; BEGIN OPEN V_CURSOR1 FOR SELECT * FROM EMP; OPEN V_CURSOR2 FOR SELECT * FROM DEPT; EMPCURSOR := V_CURSOR1; DEPTCURSOR := V_CURSOR2; END OPEN_TWO_CURSORS; END CURSPKG; / ``` The following C# example demonstrates how you might obtain table and column information using the stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: ``` CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CURSPKG AS PROCEDURE OPEN_ONE_CURSOR (N_EMPNO IN NUMBER, IO_CURSOR OUT T_CURSOR) IS V_CURSOR T_CURSOR; BEGIN IF N_EMPNO <> 0 THEN OPEN V_CURSOR FOR SELECT EMP.EMPNO, EMP.ENAME, DEPT.DEPTNO, DEPT.DNAME FROM EMP, DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO AND EMP.EMPNO = N_EMPNO; ELSE OPEN V_CURSOR FOR SELECT EMP.EMPNO, EMP.ENAME, DEPT.DEPTNO, DEPT.DNAME FROM EMP, DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO; END IF; IO_CURSOR := V_CURSOR; END OPEN_ONE_CURSOR; PROCEDURE OPEN_TWO_CURSORS (EMPCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR, DEPTCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR) IS V_CURSOR1 T_CURSOR; V_CURSOR2 T_CURSOR; BEGIN OPEN V_CURSOR1 FOR SELECT * FROM EMP; OPEN V_CURSOR2 FOR SELECT * FROM DEPT; EMPCURSOR := V_CURSOR1; DEPTCURSOR := V_CURSOR2; END OPEN_TWO_CURSORS; END CURSPKG; / ```C# eksemplet nedenfor viser hvordan du kan få tabell- og informasjon ved hjelp av den lagrede prosedyren.

trans-unit.source: ```c# // GetConnectionString() returns a connection string for // the data source. string connString = GetConnectionString(); DataSet ds = new DataSet(); OracleConnection conn = new OracleConnection(connString); OracleCommand cmd = conn.CreateCommand(); cmd.CommandText = "CURSPKG.OPEN_TWO_CURSORS"; cmd.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure; cmd.Parameters.Add("EMPCURSOR", OracleType.Cursor).Direction = ParameterDirection.Output; cmd.Parameters.Add("DEPTCURSOR", OracleType.Cursor).Direction = ParameterDirection.Output; OracleDataAdapter da = new OracleDataAdapter(cmd); da.TableMappings.Add("Table", "Emp"); da.TableMappings.Add("Table1", "Dept"); da.Fill(ds); ds.Relations.Add("EmpDept", ds.Tables["Dept"].Columns["Deptno"], ds.Tables["Emp"].Columns["Deptno"], false); ``` The following Visual Basic example demonstrates how to use an OracleDataAdapter to fill a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> using an Oracle `REF CURSOR`.
trans-unit.target: ```c# // GetConnectionString() returns a connection string for // the data source. string connString = GetConnectionString(); DataSet ds = new DataSet(); OracleConnection conn = new OracleConnection(connString); OracleCommand cmd = conn.CreateCommand(); cmd.CommandText = "CURSPKG.OPEN_TWO_CURSORS"; cmd.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure; cmd.Parameters.Add("EMPCURSOR", OracleType.Cursor).Direction = ParameterDirection.Output; cmd.Parameters.Add("DEPTCURSOR", OracleType.Cursor).Direction = ParameterDirection.Output; OracleDataAdapter da = new OracleDataAdapter(cmd); da.TableMappings.Add("Table", "Emp"); da.TableMappings.Add("Table1", "Dept"); da.Fill(ds); ds.Relations.Add("EmpDept", ds.Tables["Dept"].Columns["Deptno"], ds.Tables["Emp"].Columns["Deptno"], false); ```Visual Basic i eksemplet viser hvordan du bruker en OracleDataAdapter til å fylle en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>ved hjelp av en Oracle `REF CURSOR`.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: These examples use tables that are defined in the Oracle Scott/Tiger schema, and require the following PL/SQL package and package body.
trans-unit.target: Disse eksemplene bruker tabeller som er definert i skjemaet Oracle Scott/Tiger, og krever at følgende PL/SQL-pakken og pakken meldingsteksten.

trans-unit.source: You must create these on your server to use the examples.
trans-unit.target: Du må opprette disse på serveren til å bruke eksempler.

trans-unit.source: Create the following Oracle package on the Oracle server.
trans-unit.target: Opprett følgende Oracle-pakke for Oracle-serveren.

trans-unit.source: ``` CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CURSPKG AS TYPE T_CURSOR IS REF CURSOR; PROCEDURE OPEN_ONE_CURSOR (N_EMPNO IN NUMBER, IO_CURSOR OUT T_CURSOR); PROCEDURE OPEN_TWO_CURSORS (EMPCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR, DEPTCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR); END CURSPKG; / ``` Create the following Oracle package body on the Oracle server.
trans-unit.target: ``` CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CURSPKG AS TYPE T_CURSOR IS REF CURSOR; PROCEDURE OPEN_ONE_CURSOR (N_EMPNO IN NUMBER, IO_CURSOR OUT T_CURSOR); PROCEDURE OPEN_TWO_CURSORS (EMPCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR, DEPTCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR); END CURSPKG; / ```Opprette følgende Oracle pakken meldingsteksten i Oracle-serveren.

trans-unit.source: ``` CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CURSPKG AS PROCEDURE OPEN_ONE_CURSOR (N_EMPNO IN NUMBER, IO_CURSOR OUT T_CURSOR) IS V_CURSOR T_CURSOR; BEGIN IF N_EMPNO <> 0 THEN OPEN V_CURSOR FOR SELECT EMP.EMPNO, EMP.ENAME, DEPT.DEPTNO, DEPT.DNAME FROM EMP, DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO AND EMP.EMPNO = N_EMPNO; ELSE OPEN V_CURSOR FOR SELECT EMP.EMPNO, EMP.ENAME, DEPT.DEPTNO, DEPT.DNAME FROM EMP, DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO; END IF; IO_CURSOR := V_CURSOR; END OPEN_ONE_CURSOR; PROCEDURE OPEN_TWO_CURSORS (EMPCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR, DEPTCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR) IS V_CURSOR1 T_CURSOR; V_CURSOR2 T_CURSOR; BEGIN OPEN V_CURSOR1 FOR SELECT * FROM EMP; OPEN V_CURSOR2 FOR SELECT * FROM DEPT; EMPCURSOR := V_CURSOR1; DEPTCURSOR := V_CURSOR2; END OPEN_TWO_CURSORS; END CURSPKG; / ``` This Visual Basic example executes a PL/SQL stored procedure that returns two `REF CURSOR` parameters, and fills a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> with the rows that are returned.
trans-unit.target: ``` CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CURSPKG AS PROCEDURE OPEN_ONE_CURSOR (N_EMPNO IN NUMBER, IO_CURSOR OUT T_CURSOR) IS V_CURSOR T_CURSOR; BEGIN IF N_EMPNO <> 0 THEN OPEN V_CURSOR FOR SELECT EMP.EMPNO, EMP.ENAME, DEPT.DEPTNO, DEPT.DNAME FROM EMP, DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO AND EMP.EMPNO = N_EMPNO; ELSE OPEN V_CURSOR FOR SELECT EMP.EMPNO, EMP.ENAME, DEPT.DEPTNO, DEPT.DNAME FROM EMP, DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO; END IF; IO_CURSOR := V_CURSOR; END OPEN_ONE_CURSOR; PROCEDURE OPEN_TWO_CURSORS (EMPCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR, DEPTCURSOR OUT T_CURSOR) IS V_CURSOR1 T_CURSOR; V_CURSOR2 T_CURSOR; BEGIN OPEN V_CURSOR1 FOR SELECT * FROM EMP; OPEN V_CURSOR2 FOR SELECT * FROM DEPT; EMPCURSOR := V_CURSOR1; DEPTCURSOR := V_CURSOR2; END OPEN_TWO_CURSORS; END CURSPKG; / ```Dette eksemplet i Visual Basic utfører en PL/SQL-lagret prosedyre som returnerer to `REF CURSOR` parametere og fyll en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>med rader som returneres.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: ```vb# ' GetConnectionString() returns a connection string for ' the data source. Dim connString As New String(GetConnectionString()) Dim ds As New DataSet() Dim conn As New OracleConnection(connString) Dim cmd As OracleCommand = conn.CreateCommand() cmd.CommandText = "CURSPKG.OPEN_TWO_CURSORS" cmd.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure cmd.Parameters.Add("EMPCURSOR", OracleType.Cursor).Direction = _ ParameterDirection.Output cmd.Parameters.Add("DEPTCURSOR", OracleType.Cursor).Direction = _ ParameterDirection.Output Dim da As New OracleDataAdapter(cmd) da.TableMappings.Add("Table", "Emp") da.TableMappings.Add("Table1", "Dept") da.Fill(ds) ds.Relations.Add("EmpDept", ds.Tables("Dept").Columns("Deptno"), _ ds.Tables("Emp").Columns("Deptno"), False) ``` After using the OracleDataAdapter to perform a `Fill` or `FillSchema` operation, the `DataColumn.ReadOnly` property always returns false, regardless of whether a column can be updated or not, because the Oracle server does not return this information.
trans-unit.target: ```vb# ' GetConnectionString() returns a connection string for ' the data source. Dim connString As New String(GetConnectionString()) Dim ds As New DataSet() Dim conn As New OracleConnection(connString) Dim cmd As OracleCommand = conn.CreateCommand() cmd.CommandText = "CURSPKG.OPEN_TWO_CURSORS" cmd.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure cmd.Parameters.Add("EMPCURSOR", OracleType.Cursor).Direction = _ ParameterDirection.Output cmd.Parameters.Add("DEPTCURSOR", OracleType.Cursor).Direction = _ ParameterDirection.Output Dim da As New OracleDataAdapter(cmd) da.TableMappings.Add("Table", "Emp") da.TableMappings.Add("Table1", "Dept") da.Fill(ds) ds.Relations.Add("EmpDept", ds.Tables("Dept").Columns("Deptno"), _ ds.Tables("Emp").Columns("Deptno"), False) ```Når du har brukt OracleDataAdapter til å utføre en `Fill` eller `FillSchema` operasjonen i `DataColumn.ReadOnly` egenskapen returnerer alltid USANN, uavhengig om en kolonne kan oppdateres eller ikke, fordi Oracle-serveren ikke returnerer denne informasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>, the following read/write properties are set to their default values, as shown in the table.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en forekomst av <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>, følgende egenskaper for lese-og skrivetilgang er satt til standardverdiene, som vist i tabellen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: |Properties|Default value| |----------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingMappingAction%2A>|`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| |<xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>|`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| You can change the value of any of these properties through a separate call to the property.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskaper | Standardverdien | |----------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingMappingAction%2A>| `MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| | <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>| `MissingSchemaAction.Add`| Du kan endre verdien for disse egenskapene via en egen kall til egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingMappingAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref> class with the specified SQL SELECT statement.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref> klassen med den angitte SQL SELECT-setningen.

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> constructor sets the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property to the value specified in the `selectCommand` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne implementeringen av den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>konstruktøren angir den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>egenskapen til verdien angitt i den `selectCommand` parameteren.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>, the following read/write properties are set to their default values, as shown in the table.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en forekomst av <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>, følgende egenskaper for lese-og skrivetilgang er satt til standardverdiene, som vist i tabellen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: |Properties|Initial value| |----------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingMappingAction%2A>|`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| |<xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>|`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| You can change the value of any of these properties through a separate call to the property.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskaper | Standardverdi | |----------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingMappingAction%2A>| `MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| | <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>| `MissingSchemaAction.Add`| Du kan endre verdien for disse egenskapene via en egen kall til egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingMappingAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> that is an SQL SELECT statement or stored procedure, and is set as the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand*> property of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> som er en SQL SELECT-setning eller lagret prosedyre, og er angitt som den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand*>for den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref> class with an SQL SELECT statement and an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref> klasse SQL SELECT-setninger og en <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> can be useful in an application that must call the `Fill` method for two or more <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> objects.
trans-unit.target: Denne implementeringen av den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>kan være nyttig når et program som må kalle den `Fill` metode for to eller flere <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>objekter.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: A string that is an SQL SELECT statement or stored procedure to be used by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand*> property of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En streng som en SQL SELECT-setning eller lagret prosedyre som skal brukes av den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand*>for den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"></xref> that represents the connection.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"> </xref> som representerer tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref> class with an SQL SELECT statement and a connection string.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref> klassen med SQL SELECT-setninger og en tilkoblingsstreng.

trans-unit.source: A string that is an SQL SELECT statement or stored procedure to be used by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand*> property of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En streng som en SQL SELECT-setning eller lagret prosedyre som skal brukes av den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand*>for den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand*>

trans-unit.source: The connection string.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure used to delete records in the database.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en SQL-setningen eller lagret prosedyre som brukes til å slette poster i databasen.

trans-unit.source: When the DeleteCommand property is assigned to a previously created <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> is not cloned.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen DeleteCommand er tilordnet til en tidligere opprettet <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>ikke klones.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the DeleteCommand maintains a reference to the previously created <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>.
trans-unit.target: I stedet beholder DeleteCommand en referanse til det tidligere opprettet <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: During an update operation, if DeleteCommand is not set and primary key information is present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, you can use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> class to automatically generate the DeleteCommand, and additional commands needed to reconcile the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to the database.
trans-unit.target: Under en oppdateringsoperasjon Hvis DeleteCommand ikke er angitt og primære nøkkelinformasjon finnes i den <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>klasse som automatisk genererer DeleteCommand og flere kommandoer kreves for å avstemme den <xref:System.Data.DataSet>til databasen.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: To do this, set the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil gjøre dette, kan du angi <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generation logic also requires key column information to be present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: Generering logikken krever også informasjon om nøkkelkolonner i <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: For more information see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon se [generering kommandoer med CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> used during an update operation to delete records in the database that correspond to deleted rows in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataSet" name="DataSet" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> brukes under en oppdateringsoperasjon for å slette poster i databasen som svarer til slettede radene i den <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataSet" name="DataSet" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure used to insert new records into the database.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en SQL-setningen eller lagret prosedyre som brukes til å sette inn nye poster i databasen.

trans-unit.source: When the InsertCommand property is assigned to a previously created <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> is not cloned.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen InsertCommand er tilordnet til en tidligere opprettet <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>objektet i <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>ikke klones.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: Instead, InsertCommand maintains a reference to the previously created <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>.
trans-unit.target: I stedet beholder InsertCommand en referanse til det tidligere opprettet <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: During an update operation, if InsertCommand is not set and primary key information is present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, you can use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> class to automatically generate InsertCommand, and additional commands needed to reconcile the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to the database.
trans-unit.target: Under en oppdateringsoperasjon Hvis InsertCommand ikke er angitt og primære nøkkelinformasjon finnes i den <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>klasse som automatisk genererer InsertCommand og flere kommandoer kreves for å avstemme den <xref:System.Data.DataSet>til databasen.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: To do this, set the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil gjøre dette, kan du angi <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generation logic also requires key column information to be present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: Generering logikken krever også informasjon om nøkkelkolonner i <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: For more information see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon se [generering kommandoer med CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If execution of this command returns rows, these rows may be added to the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> depending upon how you set the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.UpdatedRowSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis utførelse av kommandoen returnerer rader, disse radene kan legges til i <xref:System.Data.DataSet>avhengig av hvordan du angir den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.UpdatedRowSource%2A>for den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>objektet.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.UpdatedRowSource%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: When you update a column with the `LONG RAW` data type, an exception is thrown when you enter a value of `NULL` in the column.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppdaterer en kolonne med det `LONG RAW` datatypen et unntak når du angir en verdi for `NULL` i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: The Oracle `LONG RAW` data type is a deprecated type in Oracle version 8.0.
trans-unit.target: Oracle `LONG RAW` datatypen er en avskrevet type i Oracle versjon 8.0.

trans-unit.source: To avoid this error, use the `BLOB` data type instead of `LONG RAW`.
trans-unit.target: For å unngå problemet, kan du bruke den `BLOB` datatypen i stedet for `LONG RAW`.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> used during an update operation to insert records in the database that correspond to new rows in the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> brukes under en oppdateringsoperasjon for å sette inn poster i databasen som samsvarer med nye rader i den <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during an update operation after a command is executed against the database.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer i løpet av en oppdateringsoperasjon når en kommando kjøres mot databasen.

trans-unit.source: When using the `Update` method, there are two events that occur per data row updated.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker den `Update` metoden, to hendelser som inntreffer per dataraden oppdatert.

trans-unit.source: The order of execution is as follows: 1.
trans-unit.target: Rekkefølgen på utføringen er som følger: 1.

trans-unit.source: The values in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> are moved to the parameter values.
trans-unit.target: Verdiene i den <xref:System.Data.DataRow>flyttes til parameterverdiene.</xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: The `OnRowUpdating` event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Den `OnRowUpdating` hendelsen skjer.

trans-unit.source: The command executes.
trans-unit.target: Utfører.

trans-unit.source: If the `UpdateRowSource` enumeration is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the **DataRow**.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `UpdateRowSource` opplisting er satt til `FirstReturnedRecord`, først returnerte resultatet er plassert i den **DataRow**.

trans-unit.source: If there are output parameters, they are placed in the **DataRow**.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er utdataparametere, de er plassert i den **DataRow**.

trans-unit.source: The `OnRowUpdated` event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Den `OnRowUpdated` hendelsen skjer.

trans-unit.source: `AcceptChanges` is called.
trans-unit.target: `AcceptChanges`kalles.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*> before a command is executed against the data source.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer i løpet av <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>før en kommando kjøres mot datakilden.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: When using the `Update` method, there are two events that occur per data row updated.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker den `Update` metoden, to hendelser som inntreffer per dataraden oppdatert.

trans-unit.source: The order of execution is as follows: 1.
trans-unit.target: Rekkefølgen på utføringen er som følger: 1.

trans-unit.source: The values in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> are moved to the parameter values.
trans-unit.target: Verdiene i den <xref:System.Data.DataRow>flyttes til parameterverdiene.</xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: The `OnRowUpdating` event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Den `OnRowUpdating` hendelsen skjer.

trans-unit.source: The command executes.
trans-unit.target: Utfører.

trans-unit.source: If the `UpdateRowSource` enumeration is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the **DataRow**.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `UpdateRowSource` opplisting er satt til `FirstReturnedRecord`, først returnerte resultatet er plassert i den **DataRow**.

trans-unit.source: If there are output parameters, they are placed in the **DataRow**.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er utdataparametere, de er plassert i den **DataRow**.

trans-unit.source: The `OnRowUpdated` event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Den `OnRowUpdated` hendelsen skjer.

trans-unit.source: `AcceptChanges` is called.
trans-unit.target: `AcceptChanges`kalles.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure used to select records in the database.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en SQL-setningen eller lagret prosedyre som brukes til å velge poster i databasen.

trans-unit.source: When SelectCommand is assigned to a previously created <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> is not cloned.
trans-unit.target: Når SelectCommand er tilordnet til en tidligere opprettet <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>ikke klones.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the SelectCommand maintains a reference to the previously created <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: I stedet SelectCommand opprettholder en referanse til det tidligere opprettet <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>objektet.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: If SelectCommand does not return any rows, no tables are added to the **DataSet**, and no exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: Hvis SelectCommand ikke returnerer alle rader, ingen tabeller er lagt til i **datasettet**, og ingen unntak er startet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> that is used during a fill operation to select records from database for placement in the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> som brukes under en Fylloperasjonen til å velge poster fra databasen for plassering i den <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha en beskrivelse for dette medlemmet kan du se <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand*>.</xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>

trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: A new object that is a copy of this instance.
trans-unit.target: Et nytt objekt som er en kopi av denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables batch processing support, and specifies the number of commands that can be executed in a batch.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som aktiverer eller deaktiverer satsvis behandling kundestøtte, og angir antall kommandoer som kan utføres i en bunke.

trans-unit.source: Use the UpdateBatchSize property to update a data source with changes from a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk UpdateBatchSize-egenskapen for å oppdatere en datakilde med endringer fra <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: This can increase application performance by reducing the number of round-trips to the server.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan øke ytelsen ved å redusere antallet gå veien om til serveren.

trans-unit.source: Executing an extremely large batch could decrease performance.
trans-unit.target: Kjøring av en svært bunken kan redusere ytelsen.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should test for the optimum batch size setting before you implement your application.
trans-unit.target: Du bør derfor teste for den ideelle bunke størrelse innstillingen før du tar programmet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> is thrown if the value is set to a number less than zero.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>oppstår hvis verdien er satt til et tall er mindre enn null.</xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>

trans-unit.source: The number of rows to process per batch.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader som skal behandles per bunke.

trans-unit.source: Value:
trans-unit.target: Verdi:

trans-unit.source: Effect:
trans-unit.target: Effekt:

trans-unit.source: There is no limit on the batch size.
trans-unit.target: Det er ingen grense på bunkestørrelsen.

trans-unit.source: Disables batch updating.
trans-unit.target: Deaktiverer oppdatering av bunken.

trans-unit.source: > 1
trans-unit.target: > 1

trans-unit.source: Changes are sent using batches of UpdateBatchSize operations at a time.
trans-unit.target: Endringene er sendt ved hjelp av bunker UpdateBatchSize operasjoner om gangen.

trans-unit.source: When setting this to a value other than 1 all the commands associated with the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref> have to have their <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.UpdatedRowSource*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_OutputParameters" name="OutputParameters" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir dette til en annen verdi enn 1 alle kommandoer som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref> må ha deres <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.UpdatedRowSource*>-egenskapen satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""> </xref> eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_OutputParameters" name="OutputParameters" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.UpdatedRowSource*>

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Et unntak ellers.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure used to update records in the database.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en SQL-setningen eller lagret prosedyre som brukes til å oppdatere poster i databasen.

trans-unit.source: When UpdateCommand is assigned to a previously created <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> is not cloned.
trans-unit.target: Når UpdateCommand er tilordnet til en tidligere opprettet <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>ikke klones.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the UpdateCommand maintains a reference to the previously created <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: I stedet UpdateCommand opprettholder en referanse til det tidligere opprettet <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>objektet.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: During an update operation, if <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A> is not set and primary key information is present in the **DataSet**, you can use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> class to automatically generate <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, and additional commands needed to reconcile the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to the database.
trans-unit.target: Under en oppdateringsoperasjon Hvis <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>er ikke angitt og primærnøkkel informasjon finnes i den **datasettet**, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>klassen for å generere automatisk <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, og flere kommandoer som trengs for å avstemme den <xref:System.Data.DataSet>til databasen.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: To do this, set the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil gjøre dette, kan du angi <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generation logic also requires key column information to be present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: Generering logikken krever også informasjon om nøkkelkolonner i <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: For more information see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon se [generering kommandoer med CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If execution of this command returns rows, these rows may be merged with the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> depending upon how you set the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.UpdatedRowSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis utførelse av kommandoen returnerer rader, disse radene kan slås sammen med den <xref:System.Data.DataSet>avhengig av hvordan du angir den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.UpdatedRowSource%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>objektet.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.UpdatedRowSource%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: When you update a column with the `LONG RAW` data type, an exception is thrown when you enter a value of `NULL` in the column.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppdaterer en kolonne med det `LONG RAW` datatypen et unntak når du angir en verdi for `NULL` i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: The Oracle `LONG RAW` data type is a deprecated type in Oracle version 8.0.
trans-unit.target: Oracle `LONG RAW` datatypen er en avskrevet type i Oracle versjon 8.0.

trans-unit.source: To avoid this error, use the `BLOB` data type instead of `LONG RAW`.
trans-unit.target: For å unngå problemet, kan du bruke den `BLOB` datatypen i stedet for `LONG RAW`.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> used during an update operation to update records in the database that correspond to modified rows in the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> brukes under en oppdateringsoperasjon til å oppdatere poster i databasen som svarer til endrede radene i den <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>.
